name: Intergalactic Smoothie CORP
description:
This is a game made for Space Jam 14.

In this game you create smoothies for hungry space-going customers, serve quickly and correctly for extra money, manage your money and resources in order to try and get the highest possible score within five minutes.

download both the .exe and .pck (original submission)

download the solo .exe file for the updated version that fixes a crash

Updated to be runnable in browser with HTML
